word_mean: 两性体，雌雄同体，半阴阳

sentence.Network_en: Some figures were hermaphrodite idols , with phalluses in their foreheads.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些供膜拜的神像是雌雄同体,阳物长在前额.

sentence.Network_en: Most flatworms are hermaphrodite and, in tapeworms, self - fertilization usually takes place.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数的扁虫雌雄同体, 绦虫常常进行自体受精.

sentence.Network_en: Having only one type of sexual organ; not a hermaphrodite.
sentence.Network_cn: 雌雄异体的只有一种类型性器官的; 不是雌雄同体的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 这个全裸的阴阳人(hermaphrodite)走近了女人身边。这时，围观的群众全都叫喊起来：“强暴她！”女人努力想要挣脱，可是那个男人死 …

藤壶雌雄同体（hermaphrodite）。这意味着藤壶有雌雄两个生殖器官。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Latin from Greek hermaphroditos (see Hermaphroditus)

encyclopedia.content: 阴阳人；双性人；雌雄同体者；两性体；双性人 来历为Hermes（宙斯之子）和Aphrodite（性爱与美之女神）的结合 关于雌雄同体者有两个神话：其一是二者生了一个孩子，性别难以确定；其二是他俩的孩子特别漂亮，水仙女爱上了他，与他合为一体。 Hermaphrodite （希腊神话）中文翻译为赫马佛洛狄忒斯或赫马佛迪斯特。 赫尔墨斯和阿佛洛狄忒的结合。 传说他原是一位俊美的青年。一次，他穿越一片森林时，在一处湖边停下来观看自己在水

entry.tran: 两性体;阴阳人;雌雄同体;雌雄同株
entry.def: A hermaphrodite is a person, animal, or flower that has both male and female reproductive organs.

means.word_mean: 1. one having both male and female sexual characteristics and organs; at birth an unambiguous assignment of male or female cannot be made
1. of animal or plant; having both male female reproductive organs
